to break it up in

2719.19.text:
that might be the

2721.08.text:

2727.90.text:
to have those complex

2730.36.text: So now the euro is here.

to have a proper,

2825.77.text:

2828.80.text:
that side of Europe

2833.27.text:

2838.94.text:

2853.86.text:

the interesting thing

2861.77.text:

2873.87.text:
but never be heard

3008.72.text:

3013.41.text:
that many young people

3057.30.text:
to have the lowest popular

increasingly in the Western

3092.42.text:
>> I think, with our, you

from the Second World

some of the big questions don't

3103.13.text:
so we go down to, you know,

3107.06.text: and you're trying to vote for --

3107.86.text:

3110.57.text:

3112.46.text:
to difficult questions

How are you going to pay

3120.33.text:

3122.90.text:
When a question seems

3126.09.text:
and when there is
a clear answer,

3128.60.text:
and some that you
can get behind,

3129.79.text: you do see a big turnout.

3131.01.text:
So, my own country, Ireland,

3135.43.text:
And it was incredibly
joyous thing.

3137.79.text:
where homosexuality was illegal

3140.85.text:
You know, we had parties

3142.83.text:
young people voted in
extraordinary numbers.

3146.58.text:
It's a rare situation
where there is something

3148.50.text:
that you can vote for that
so clear and that galvanises

3151.52.text:
so people so much -- the rest

3154.18.text:
over small policy differences

3158.43.text:
and where the appeal of --

much by reality --

3167.40.text:
in the reality-based community

>> You know, Helen, you

3176.57.text:
>> Okay. Sorry for those

3178.08.text:
constrained by reality

3180.92.text:
I don't know how to

3182.83.text:

3184.91.text:

3186.68.text:
And that's the democratic

3188.40.text:
is that you know you're either

3191.64.text:
where the problems are hard, the

3194.85.text:

3197.36.text:
and right, left, any

3199.46.text:

3201.58.text:
and it's hard to

who decides European

3390.94.text:

That is what it represents

3411.24.text:
>> Well, I think that -- I will

which is that we are in a

3416.78.text:
onto questions and they are

3420.40.text:

3433.14.text: It's got to make a decision.
